titles.title: Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the employer wage credit for activated military reservists.
Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Military Reserve Small Business Jobs Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2018 the tax credit for differential wage payments made by a small business employer on behalf of employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.
